jd: Greetings from Sligo Software Solutions, Inc. !!SLIGO is a Software Development & IT Consulting company. Role: Sr. Java DeveloperLocation: Schenectady, New YorkDuration: 30 MonthsJob ID: SLG - 19 - 9892Client: NY StateRespond by Date: 10/08/24 5:00 PM Description This position maintains several OPWDD Java web applications including Division of Quality Improvement (DQIA) and SEMP applications. The position also supports enterprise projects as needed and provides training and mentoring to lesser experienced developers.Duties Design and create scripts for databases,Design, develop, maintain and enhance Java applications,Test applicationsCreate and maintain documentationAssist with implementation and ITSM incidents.Mandatory Requirements Experience (12+ Years)Is involved with all facets of the software development process, including the research, design, programming, testing and implementation of computer software.RequirementsThis is an 100% Onsite84 months experience programming server-side Java web applications in a multi-tier environment using JDK 1.5 or higher.60 months experience writing queries, stored procedures, functions, packages, and triggers in Oracle 10g or higher.48 months development experience in database design and object creation/modification of databases consisting of 20 or more tables in Oracle 10g or higher.48 months programming experience with Java Server Faces.36 months programming experience with Java Persistence API.36 months experience with JavaScript/JQuery.RésuméCopy of Candidate Identification (i.e., Driver’s License/Green Card/Visa and Passport if applicable)Any documents referenced in the above Requested Qualifications(i.e., professional certifications, degrees, etc.)ThanksSrikanth Vanam
